Explosives.Name: Dynamite (stick)
Explosives.Description: As an action, a creature can light a stick of dynamite and throw it at a point up to 60 feet away. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 3d6 bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Dynamite can be bound together for increased damage and burst radius.

Explosives.Name: Grenade, fragmentation
Explosives.Description: As an action, a character can throw a fragmentation grenade at a point up to 60 feet away. Each creature within 20 feet of the explosion must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 5d6 piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Explosives.Name: Grenade, smoke
Explosives.Description: As an action, a character can throw a smoke grenade at a point up to 60 feet away. The grenade creates a heavily obscured area in a 20-foot radius one round after landing. Wind can disperse the smoke.

Explosives.Name: Grenade Launcher
Explosives.Description: With a grenade launcher, a character can propel grenades up to 120 feet away.
